medical_history.chief_complaint: Minor dyspnea on exertion and transient palpitations.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after losing ambulation at the age of 9. He uses a wheelchair and reports infrequent episodes of palpitations.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD; duplication of dystrophin gene exons 8 to 11).
medical_history.family_history: The mother is a DMD carrier with occasional palpitations, but no previous cardiovascular studies.
